response.overview: Welcome, foolish mortals! In honor of the DisneylandÂ® Resort 70th Celebration, you're invited to step into a ghostly realm of happy haunts, eerie elegance, and frighteningly playful spirits in this immersive Point of View journey through the Haunted Mansion. From floating candelabras to ballroom waltzes beyond the grave, every spine-tingling scene invites you deeper into one of Disneyland Resort's most iconic attractions. Listen closely as your Ghost Host guides your Doom Buggy past mischievous phantoms and ghosts who are inviting you to a swinging wake. It's a wickedly delightful tribute to seven decades of storytelling where the magic of Disney meets the mystery of the afterlife.
response.tagline: Glide past ghosts and ghouls in this frightfully fun Point of View film through the Haunted Mansion.
response.title: Haunted Mansion | Disneyland Resort
